meanings.definition: A system for recording and storing voice messages left over the telephone when the recipient is unable to answer.
meanings.sent1: I listened to the voicemail my friend left me.
meanings.sent2: Please leave a voicemail if I don't pick up the phone.
meanings.sent3: The voicemail was full of funny sounds.
meanings.sent4: Her voicemail was a digital diary of missed calls.
meanings.sent5: The voicemail captured the urgency in her voice.

meanings.definition: A recorded message left on a voicemail system.
meanings.sent1: I left a voicemail for my boss about the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The voicemail from my mom made me smile.
meanings.sent3: The voicemail sounded like a robot talking.
meanings.sent4: His voicemail was a reminder of our conversation.
meanings.sent5: The voicemail echoed in the empty room.
